body_text:
Identified in our Experiments work week there are at least three commandments:

Thou shall never break the ability to update Firefox
Thou shall never make Firefox slower
Thou shall never reduce retention

There may be more. However, in the spirit of Safety what are things that we should enforce in code that Normandy (recipe-client, recipe-server) should never be able to do?
